txt.en: The Flame of Ancalamír allows you to convert some unwanted equipment to Motes of Enchantment or Figments of Splendour, which can be traded in to certain barter vendors throughout Middle-earth. Right-click on the Flame in your inventory to use it, and then left-click on the piece of equipment you wish to reduce to Motes or Figments. The Flame of Ancalamír can always be purchased from one of the High Enchanters in Gorgoroth should you lose it.
